#So, you've ascended to the throne of the Hive! #Now what?
- Rejoice! You are the Queen, the beating heart of the Xenomorph swarm. Your will shapes the Hive, and your command directs its wrath.
\n - As the matriarch, your duty is to expand, defend, and lead. Without you, the Hive crumbles—but with you, it thrives. - For intermediate players wishing to try out the commanding side of Xenos, this will start with what should be done at the start.
#Now what? First we must choose our hive location, this is not that all important and selecting where you spawn as your hive location will do. Once you have found a hive location follow the steps.
\n
- Use your Order Construction ability to create a hive core and then fill it with your plasma. - You can emit recovery pheremones to gain plasma to fill the hivecore, remember your pheromones are the strongest in the hive!
\n
- Once filled, move ontop of the new hive weeds emitted from the hivecore then grow your ovipositor. - Remember to stand still whhile growing your ovipositor.
Well done, you have successfully grown your ovipositor to allow for your children to gain evolution and thrive,
- Another important job of the Drone is to plant weeds. - Weeds allow us to rest to regain our health and energy! - We can also only construct the hive on weeds.
\n
- Our final goal is to protect the Queen and plant her eggs so our hive may grow! - Eggs can be placed on weeds, and contain parasites. - Parasites can be extracted from the eggs, but be wary that parasites have short lifespans away from the weeds!
\n
- When a parasite is placed on a living host, a new larva will be born! Rejoice! - Hosts that hold the growing larva are very precious, and should be secured to a resin wall as soon as possible.
